question: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi approved the Joint Declaration of Intent (JDI) between Indai and this country regarding cooperation in the sector of alternative medicine.
explanation: The Union Cabinet chaired by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has approved the Joint Declaration of Intent (JDI) between Germany and India regarding cooperation in the sector of alternative medicine. It will enhance bilateral cooperation between the two countries in the areas of traditional/alternative medicine.
